title: Final Call

author: Stu Davidson
text: 15 October 2024 : Tuesday Oct 2024 : Tuesday See More Photos of:  Travel If my timezone calculations are right, today is the final day of the latest Peak Design Kickstarter. They’ve some cool new bags, see below, which you can grab via this link! I’ve gone for the 7L Sling along with a backpack… in cloud. An ideal mix to cover short and long hikes/photo adventures. Oh, and just to be clear, we don’t collaborate anymore. All these new bags are simply the genius of their design team!
html:
15

October 2024 : Tuesday Oct 2024 : Tuesday

See More Photos of:  Travel

If my timezone calculations are right, today is the final day of the latest Peak Design Kickstarter. They’ve some cool new bags, see below, which you can grab via this link! I’ve gone for the 7L Sling along with a backpack… in cloud. An ideal mix to cover short and long hikes/photo adventures.




Oh, and just to be clear, we don’t collaborate anymore. All these new bags are simply the genius of their design team!
